trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an invalid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if <paramref name="options" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase" />), if <paramref name="value" /> contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋 (也就是說，如果 <paramref name="options" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase" />) 時，如果 <paramref name="value" /> 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="value" />只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting with the third character position in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法用來尋找選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 後面接著"m"中兩個字串的第三個字元位置開始的位置。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含必要的子字串。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，所以在這兩種情況下，方法執行區分文化特性的比較時都會傳回 "m" 在字串中的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".
trans-unit.target: 請注意，就第一個字串的情況，這個字串是選擇性連字號後面接著 "m"，結果方法不是傳回選擇性連字號的索引，而是傳回 "m" 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.
trans-unit.target: 只有在執行序數比較時，方法才會傳回第一個字串中選擇性連字號的索引。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字串。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified substring and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the section of the source string that starts at the specified index and contains the specified number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的子字串，並傳回來源字串的區段 (起始於指定索引且含有指定項目數) 內第一個相符項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within the section of <paramref name="source" /> that starts at <paramref name="startIndex" /> and contains the number of elements specified by <paramref name="count" />; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在 <paramref name="value" /> 的區段 (開始於 <paramref name="source" />，並包含 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 所指定數目的項目) 內，<paramref name="count" /> 第一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Returns <paramref name="startIndex" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 一個可忽略的字元，則傳回 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` + `count` - 1.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串中搜尋開始向前`startIndex`結束為`startIndex` + `count` -1。

trans-unit.source: This overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 值，表示預先的字元，例如"Æ"連字 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會視為字元的元件，以正確的順序，例如"AE"的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and use the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，比較的 Unicode 值，您應該呼叫其中一個參數類型的多載<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>並用<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="source" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果 <paramref name="value" /> 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="value" />只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting in the third through sixth character positions in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)" />方法用來尋找選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 後面接著"m"中的第三個透過兩個字串中的第六個字元位置開始的位置。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含必要的子字串。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，所以在這兩種情況下，方法執行區分文化特性的比較時都會傳回 "m" 在字串中的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".
trans-unit.target: 請注意，就第一個字串的情況，這個字串是選擇性連字號後面接著 "m"，結果方法不是傳回選擇性連字號的索引，而是傳回 "m" 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The character to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字元。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: A value that defines how <c>source</c> and <c>value</c> should be compared.
trans-unit.target: 定義「來源」<c></c>和「值」<c></c>應該如何比較的值。

trans-unit.source: <c>options</c> is either the enumeration value <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" />, or a bitwise combination of one or more of the following values: <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreCase" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreSymbols" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreNonSpace" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth" />, and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreKanaType" />.
trans-unit.target: 「選項」<c></c>若不是列舉值 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" />，就是下列一或多個值的位元組合：<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreCase" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreSymbols" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreNonSpace" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreKanaType" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified character and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the section of the source string that starts at the specified index and contains the specified number of elements using the specified <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值，搜尋指定的字元，並傳回第一個相符項目 (在來源字串中起始於指定索引且含有指定項目數的區段內) 的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within the section of <paramref name="source" /> that starts at <paramref name="startIndex" /> and contains the number of elements specified by <paramref name="count" />, using the specified comparison options; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在 <paramref name="value" /> 的區段 (開始於 <paramref name="source" />，並包含 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 所指定數目的項目) 內，使用指定的比較選項，找到 <paramref name="count" /> 第一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Returns <paramref name="startIndex" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 一個可忽略的字元，則傳回 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` + `count` - 1.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串中搜尋開始向前`startIndex`結束為`startIndex` + `count` -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not valid for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType>值無效，此方法。

trans-unit.source: If `options` does not include the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`不包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元是代表預先的字元的 Unicode 值，例如連字的"Æ"(U + 00 C 6)，它可能會視為以正確的順序，例如"AE 」 及其元件的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If `options` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same.
trans-unit.target: 只要 Unicode 值相同，字元會視為等於另一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Overloads of <xref:System.String.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 多載<xref:System.String.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>字元的搜尋會執行序數搜尋，而其會搜尋字串執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="source" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an invalid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果<paramref name="value" />是可忽略的字元，結果就相當於搜尋已移除該字元。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search first began.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，這是在其中搜尋第一次開始的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method is used to find the soft hyphen (U+00AD) after an "n" in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法用來尋找"n"後的選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD)，在兩個字串。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns 1 to indicate that it has found a match at the position of the "n".
trans-unit.target: 在這兩種情況下，因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，區分文化特性的搜尋會傳回 1，指出它已找到相符項目"n"的位置。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.
trans-unit.target: 序數搜尋，不過，順利在一個字串中尋找選擇性連字號，並報告它不存在從第二個字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="source" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an invalid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if <paramref name="options" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase" />), if <paramref name="value" /> contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋 (也就是說，如果 <paramref name="options" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase" />) 時，如果 <paramref name="value" /> 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="value" />只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting in the third through sixth character positions in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法用來尋找選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 後面接著"m"中的第三個透過兩個字串中的第六個字元位置開始的位置。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含必要的子字串。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，所以在這兩種情況下，方法執行區分文化特性的比較時都會傳回 "m" 在字串中的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: When it performs an ordinal comparison, however, it finds the substring only in the first string.
trans-unit.target: 當它執行序數比較時，不過，它會尋找子字串只能在第一個字串中。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m" when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，就第一個字串，其中包含選擇性連字號後面接著"m"，此方法無法傳回選擇性連字號的索引執行區分文化特性的比較時，而是傳回"m"的索引。

trans-unit.source: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.
trans-unit.target: 只有在執行序數比較時，方法才會傳回第一個字串中選擇性連字號的索引。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a string starts with a specific prefix.
trans-unit.target: 判斷字串是否以特定字首開始。

trans-unit.source: The string to search in.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to compare with the beginning of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要與「來源」<c></c>開頭比較的字串。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified source string starts with the specified prefix.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的來源字串是否以指定字首開始。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the length of <paramref name="prefix" /> is less than or equal to the length of <paramref name="source" /> and <paramref name="source" /> starts with <paramref name="prefix" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="prefix" /> 的長度小於或等於 <paramref name="source" /> 的長度，且 <paramref name="source" /> 是以 <paramref name="prefix" /> 開始，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Every string starts and ends with an empty substring (""); therefore, if `prefix` is an empty string, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 每個字串開始和結束都空白的子字串 ("");因此，如果`prefix`為空字串，這個方法會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字串是否為前置詞或後置詞的另一個字串。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="prefix" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值，判斷指定的來源字串是否以指定字首開始。

trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="prefix" /> 的長度小於或等於 <paramref name="source" /> 的長度，且 <paramref name="source" /> 是以 <paramref name="prefix" /> 開始，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 每個字串開始和結束都空白的子字串 ("");因此，如果`prefix`為空字串，這個方法會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not valid for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType>值無效，此方法。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a specified Unicode character or string is sortable.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的 Unicode 字元或字串是否可排序。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode character.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a specified Unicode character is sortable.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的 Unicode 字元是否可排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="ch" /> parameter is sortable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="ch" /> 參數可排序，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `ch` parameter is sortable if it is a Unicode character that is defined in an internal <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo> class sort table, and is not a private use or unpaired high or low surrogate character.
trans-unit.target: `ch`參數是否可排序，如果它是在內部定義的 Unicode 字元<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>類別將排序資料表，並不是私用或未配對的高或低 surrogate 字元。

trans-unit.source: A string of zero or more Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 零或更多 Unicode 字元的字串。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a specified Unicode string is sortable.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的 Unicode 字串是否可排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="str" /> parameter is not an empty string ("") and all the Unicode characters in <paramref name="str" /> are sortable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="str" /> 參數不是空字串 ("")，且 <paramref name="str" /> 中所有的 Unicode 字元都是可排序的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Each Unicode character in the `str` parameter is represented by one or more UTF-16 encoded <xref:System.Char> objects.
trans-unit.target: 中的每個 Unicode 字元`str`參數由一個或多個 UTF 16 編碼<xref:System.Char>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `str` parameter is sortable if each Unicode character is defined in an internal <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo> class sort table, and is not a private use or unpaired high or low surrogate character.
trans-unit.target: `str`參數是否可排序的每個 Unicode 字元是否以內部定義<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>類別將排序資料表，並不是私用或未配對的高或低 surrogate 字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="str" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="str" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a string ends with a specific suffix.

trans-unit.source: The string to compare with the end of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要與「來源」<c></c>結尾比較的字串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the length of <paramref name="suffix" /> is less than or equal to the length of <paramref name="source" /> and <paramref name="source" /> ends with <paramref name="suffix" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="suffix" /> 的長度小於或等於 <paramref name="source" /> 的長度，且 <paramref name="source" /> 是以 <paramref name="suffix" /> 結束，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Every string starts and ends with an empty substring (""); therefore, if `suffix` is an empty string, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 每個字串開始和結束都空白的子字串 ("");因此，如果`suffix`為空字串，這個方法會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence of a value within a string or within a portion of it.
trans-unit.target: 傳回某值在字串或字串的一部分內，最後一次出現的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The character to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字元。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified character and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the entire source string.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的字元，並傳回整個來源字串內最後一個相符項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within <paramref name="source" />; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 中 <paramref name="source" /> 最後一次出現之以零起始的索引 (如果找得到的話)，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched backward starting at the end of the string and ending at the beginning of the string.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串搜尋是向後字串的結尾開始和結束時間字串的開頭。

trans-unit.source: This overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元是代表預先的字元的 Unicode 值，例如連字的"Æ"(U + 00 C 6)，它可能會視為以正確的順序，例如"AE 」 及其元件的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and use the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，其中只有 Unicode 值相同，字元會視為等於另一個字元，您應該呼叫其中一個參數類型的多載<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>並用<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值。

trans-unit.source: Overloads of <xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 多載<xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>字元的搜尋會執行序數搜尋，而其會搜尋字串執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果<paramref name="value" />是可忽略的字元，結果就相當於搜尋已移除該字元。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char)" /> method always returns the last index position in <paramref name="source" /> to indicate that the match is found at the end of <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char)" />方法永遠都會傳回最後一個索引位置中的<paramref name="source" />表示結尾處找到相符項目， <paramref name="source" />。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char)" /> method is used to find the soft hyphen (U+00AD) in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char)" />方法用來尋找兩個字串中選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD)。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the last index position in the string to indicate that it has found a match at the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 在這兩種情況下，因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，方法會傳回字串，表示它已找到相符項目結尾的字串中之最後索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字串。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified substring and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the entire source string.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的子字串，並傳回整個來源字串中最後一個相符項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within <paramref name="source" />; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 中 <paramref name="source" /> 最後一次出現之以零起始的索引 (如果找得到的話)，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched backward starting at the end of the string and ending at the beginning of the string.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串搜尋是向後字串的結尾開始和結束時間字串的開頭。

trans-unit.source: This overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 值，表示預先的字元，例如"Æ"連字 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會視為字元的元件，以正確的順序，例如"AE"的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and use the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，比較的 Unicode 值，您應該呼叫其中一個參數類型的多載<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>並用<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果 <paramref name="value" /> 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String)" /> method always returns <paramref name="source" />.<see cref="P:System.String.Length" />
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="value" />只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="source" />。<see cref="P:System.String.Length" />

trans-unit.source: – 1, which represents the last index position in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: – 1，表示中的最後一個索引位置<paramref name="source" />。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String)" /> method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String)" />方法用來尋找兩個字串中的三個的子字串 （選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD)、"n"，後面接著選擇性連字號和選擇性的連字號後面接著"m"）。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

trans-unit.source: In each case, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the result is the same as if the soft hyphen had not been included in <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 在每個案例中，因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，結果會與相同選擇性連字號不包含在<paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: When searching for a soft hyphen only, the method returns 6 and 5.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的選擇性連字號只時，這個方法會傳回 6 和 5。

trans-unit.source: These values correspond to the index of the last character in the two strings.
trans-unit.target: 這些值對應到兩個字串中的最後一個字元索引。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The character to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字元。

trans-unit.source: A value that defines how <c>source</c> and <c>value</c> should be compared.
trans-unit.target: 定義「來源」<c></c>和「值」<c></c>應該如何比較的值。

trans-unit.source: <c>options</c> is either the enumeration value <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" />, or a bitwise combination of one or more of the following values: <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreCase" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreSymbols" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreNonSpace" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth" />, and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreKanaType" />.
trans-unit.target: 「選項」<c></c>若不是列舉值 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" />，就是下列一或多個值的位元組合：<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreCase" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreSymbols" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreNonSpace" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreKanaType" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified character and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the entire source string using the specified <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值，搜尋指定的字元，並傳回整個來源字串內最後一個相符項目的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within <paramref name="source" />, using the specified comparison options; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在 <paramref name="value" /> 內，使用指定的比較選項，找到 <paramref name="source" /> 最後一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched backward starting at the end of the string and ending at the beginning of the string.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串搜尋是向後字串的結尾開始和結束時間字串的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not valid for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType>值無效，此方法。

trans-unit.source: If `options` does not include the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`不包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元是代表預先的字元的 Unicode 值，例如連字的"Æ"(U + 00 C 6)，它可能會視為以正確的順序，例如"AE 」 及其元件的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If `options` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same.
trans-unit.target: 只要 Unicode 值相同，字元會視為等於另一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Overloads of <xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 多載<xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>字元的搜尋會執行序數搜尋，而其會搜尋字串執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an invalid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method always returns the last character position in <paramref name="source" /> to indicate that the match is found at the end of <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法永遠都會傳回最後一個字元位置中的<paramref name="source" />表示結尾處找到相符項目， <paramref name="source" />。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method is used to search for a soft hyphen (U+00AD) in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法用來搜尋選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 中兩個字串。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns the last index position in the source string.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, an ordinal search successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，序數搜尋已成功在一個字串中尋找選擇性連字號並報告它不存在從第二個字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.

trans-unit.source: The character to locate within <c>source</c>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within the section of <paramref name="source" /> that extends from the beginning of <paramref name="source" /> to <paramref name="startIndex" />; otherwise, -1.

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf%2A> are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf%2A>正在搜尋的字串，即使使用相同的不同部分`startIndex`參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果<paramref name="value" />是可忽略的字元，結果就相當於搜尋已移除該字元。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32)" /> method is used to find a soft hyphen (U+00AD) that precedes the final "m" in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32)" />方法用來尋找兩個字串中選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 之前的最後"m"。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index position of the "m", which is the value of <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 在這兩種情況下，因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，方法會傳回"m"，也就是值的索引位置的<paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字串。

trans-unit.source: A value that defines how <c>source</c> and <c>value</c> should be compared.
trans-unit.target: 定義「來源」<c></c>和「值」<c></c>應該如何比較的值。

trans-unit.source: <c>options</c> is either the enumeration value <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" />, or a bitwise combination of one or more of the following values: <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreCase" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreSymbols" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreNonSpace" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth" />, and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreKanaType" />.
trans-unit.target: 「選項」<c></c>若不是列舉值 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" />，就是下列一或多個值的位元組合：<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreCase" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreSymbols" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreNonSpace" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreKanaType" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified substring and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the entire source string using the specified <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值，搜尋指定的子字串，並傳回整個來源字串內最後一個相符項目的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within <paramref name="source" />, using the specified comparison options; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在 <paramref name="value" /> 內，使用指定的比較選項，找到 <paramref name="source" /> 最後一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched backward starting at the end of the string and ending at the beginning of the string.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串搜尋是向後字串的結尾開始和結束時間字串的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not valid for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType>值無效，此方法。

trans-unit.source: If `options` does not include the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`不包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 值，表示預先的字元，例如"Æ"連字 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會視為字元的元件，以正確的順序，例如"AE"的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If `options` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，比較的 Unicode 值。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an invalid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if <paramref name="options" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase" />), if <paramref name="value" /> contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋 (也就是說，如果 <paramref name="options" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase" />) 時，如果 <paramref name="value" /> 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method always returns <paramref name="source" />.<see cref="P:System.String.Length" />
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="value" />只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="source" />。<see cref="P:System.String.Length" />

trans-unit.source: – 1, which represents the last index position in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: – 1，表示中的最後一個索引位置<paramref name="source" />。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法用來尋找兩個字串中的三個的子字串 （選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD)、"n"，後面接著選擇性連字號和選擇性的連字號後面接著"m"）。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

trans-unit.source: Because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns the same value that it would return if the soft hyphen were not included in the search string.
trans-unit.target: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，區分文化特性的搜尋會傳回相同的值，它就會傳回如果搜尋字串中未包含選擇性連字號。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.
trans-unit.target: 序數搜尋，不過，順利在一個字串中尋找選擇性連字號，並報告它不存在從第二個字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字串。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向後搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified substring and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the section of the source string that extends from the beginning of the string to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的子字串，並傳回最後一個相符項目 (在來源字串中從字串開頭延伸至指定索引的區段內) 的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within the section of <paramref name="source" /> that extends from the beginning of <paramref name="source" /> to <paramref name="startIndex" />; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在 <paramref name="value" /> 的區段 (從 <paramref name="source" /> 的開頭延伸至 <paramref name="source" />) 內，<paramref name="startIndex" /> 最後一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Returns <paramref name="startIndex" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 一個可忽略的字元，則傳回 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the beginning of the string.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`和結束時間字串的開頭。

trans-unit.source: This overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 值，表示預先的字元，例如"Æ"連字 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會視為字元的元件，以正確的順序，例如"AE"的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and use the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，比較的 Unicode 值，您應該呼叫其中一個參數類型的多載<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>並用<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf%2A> are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf%2A>正在搜尋的字串，即使使用相同的不同部分`startIndex`參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果 <paramref name="value" /> 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="value" />只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)" /> method is used to find a substring that includes a soft hyphen (U+00AD) and that precedes or includes the final "m" in a string.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)" />方法用來尋找包含選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD)，而且之前或是在字串中包括最後的"m"的子字串。

trans-unit.source: Because the soft hyphen in the search string is ignored, calling the method to find a substring that consists of the soft hyphen and "m" returns the position of the "m" in the string, whereas calling it to find a substring that consists of the soft hyphen and "n" returns the position of the "n".
trans-unit.target: 搜尋字串中的選擇性連字號會被忽略，因為呼叫要尋找的子字串包含選擇性連字號和"m"，會傳回"m"的位置在字串中，而呼叫它來尋找的子字串，包含選擇性連字號，"n"會傳回的方法 "n"的位置。

trans-unit.source: When the search string contains only the soft hyphen, the method returns the index of the "m", which represents the value of <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 當搜尋字串不包含只選擇性連字號時，方法會傳回"m"，其代表的值索引<paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字元。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified character and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the section of the source string that extends from the beginning of the string to the specified index using the specified <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值，搜尋指定的字元，並傳回最後一個相符項目 (在來源字串中從字串開頭延伸至指定索引的區段內) 的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within the section of <paramref name="source" /> that extends from the beginning of <paramref name="source" /> to <paramref name="startIndex" />, using the specified comparison options; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在 <paramref name="value" /> 的區段 (從 <paramref name="source" /> 的開頭至 <paramref name="source" />) 內，使用指定的比較選項，找到 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 最後一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Returns <paramref name="startIndex" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 一個可忽略的字元，則傳回 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the beginning of the string.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`和結束時間字串的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not valid for this method.

trans-unit.target: 如果`options`不包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元是代表預先的字元的 Unicode 值，例如連字的"Æ"(U + 00 C 6)，它可能會視為以正確的順序，例如"AE 」 及其元件的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If `options` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same.
trans-unit.target: 只要 Unicode 值相同，字元會視為等於另一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Overloads of <xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 多載<xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>字元的搜尋會執行序數搜尋，而其會搜尋字串執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf%2A> are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf%2A>正在搜尋的字串，即使使用相同的不同部分`startIndex`參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an invalid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果<paramref name="value" />是可忽略的字元，結果就相當於搜尋已移除該字元。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method is used to find a soft hyphen (U+00AD) that precedes the final "m" in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法用來尋找兩個字串中選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 之前的最後"m"。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns the index position of the "m".
trans-unit.target: 在這兩種情況下，因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，區分文化特性的搜尋會傳回"m"的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.
trans-unit.target: 序數搜尋，不過，順利在一個字串中尋找選擇性連字號，並報告它不存在從第二個字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The character to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字元。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向後搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified character and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the section of the source string that contains the specified number of elements and ends at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的字元，並傳回最後一個相符項目 (在來源字串中含有指定項目數且結束於指定索引的區段內) 的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within the section of <paramref name="source" /> that contains the number of elements specified by <paramref name="count" /> and that ends at <paramref name="startIndex" />; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在 <paramref name="value" /> 的區段 (包含 <paramref name="source" /> 所指定數目的項目，且結束於 <paramref name="count" />) 內，<paramref name="startIndex" /> 最後一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Returns <paramref name="startIndex" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 一個可忽略的字元，則傳回 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` - `count` + 1.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`結束為`startIndex` - `count` + 1。

trans-unit.source: This overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元是代表預先的字元的 Unicode 值，例如連字的"Æ"(U + 00 C 6)，它可能會視為以正確的順序，例如"AE 」 及其元件的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and use the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，其中只有 Unicode 值相同，字元會視為等於另一個字元，您應該呼叫其中一個參數類型的多載<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>並用<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值。

trans-unit.source: Overloads of <xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 多載<xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>字元的搜尋會執行序數搜尋，而其會搜尋字串執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
