trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="source" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果<paramref name="value" />是可忽略的字元，結果就相當於搜尋已移除該字元。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> method is used to find a soft hyphen (U+00AD) that precedes the final "m" in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32)" />方法用來尋找兩個字串中選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 之前的最後"m"。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index position of the "m", which is the value of <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 在這兩種情況下，因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，方法會傳回"m"，也就是值的索引位置的<paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字串。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向後搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: A value that defines how <c>source</c> and <c>value</c> should be compared.
trans-unit.target: 定義「來源」<c></c>和「值」<c></c>應該如何比較的值。

trans-unit.source: <c>options</c> is either the enumeration value <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" />, or a bitwise combination of one or more of the following values: <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreCase" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreSymbols" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreNonSpace" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth" />, and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreKanaType" />.
trans-unit.target: 「選項」<c></c>若不是列舉值 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" />，就是下列一或多個值的位元組合：<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreCase" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreSymbols" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreNonSpace" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreKanaType" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified substring and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the section of the source string that extends from the beginning of the string to the specified index using the specified <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值，搜尋指定的子字串，並傳回在來源字串的區段 (從字串開頭延伸至指定索引) 內最後一個相符項目的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within the section of <paramref name="source" /> that extends from the beginning of <paramref name="source" /> to <paramref name="startIndex" />, using the specified comparison options; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在 <paramref name="value" /> 的區段 (從 <paramref name="source" /> 的開頭至 <paramref name="source" />) 內，使用指定的比較選項，找到 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 最後一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Returns <paramref name="startIndex" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 一個可忽略的字元，則傳回 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the beginning of the string.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`和結束時間字串的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not valid for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType>值無效，此方法。

trans-unit.source: If `options` does not include the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`不包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 值，表示預先的字元，例如"Æ"連字 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會視為字元的元件，以正確的順序，例如"AE"的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If `options` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，比較的 Unicode 值。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf%2A> are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf%2A>正在搜尋的字串，即使使用相同的不同部分`startIndex`參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.

<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an invalid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if <paramref name="options" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase" />), if <paramref name="value" /> contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋 (也就是說，如果 <paramref name="options" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase" />) 時，如果 <paramref name="value" /> 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="value" />只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m", starting with the final "m" in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法用來尋找後面接著"m"，開頭為"m"最後兩個字串中選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 的位置。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含必要的子字串。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，所以在這兩種情況下，方法執行區分文化特性的比較時都會傳回 "m" 在字串中的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".
trans-unit.target: 請注意，就第一個字串的情況，這個字串是選擇性連字號後面接著 "m"，結果方法不是傳回選擇性連字號的索引，而是傳回 "m" 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.
trans-unit.target: 只有在執行序數比較時，方法才會傳回第一個字串中選擇性連字號的索引。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字串。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向後搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified substring and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the section of the source string that contains the specified number of elements and ends at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的子字串，並傳回最後一個相符項目 (在來源字串中含有指定項目數且結束於指定索引的區段內) 的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within the section of <paramref name="source" /> that contains the number of elements specified by <paramref name="count" /> and that ends at <paramref name="startIndex" />; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在 <paramref name="value" /> 的區段 (包含 <paramref name="source" /> 所指定數目的項目，且結束於 <paramref name="count" />) 內，<paramref name="startIndex" /> 最後一次出現的以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Returns <paramref name="startIndex" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 一個可忽略的字元，則傳回 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` - `count` + 1.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`結束為`startIndex` - `count` + 1。

trans-unit.source: This overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 值，表示預先的字元，例如"Æ"連字 (U + 00 C 6)，可能會視為字元的元件，以正確的順序，例如"AE"的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and use the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋，比較的 Unicode 值，您應該呼叫其中一個參數類型的多載<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>並用<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons .
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="source" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果 <paramref name="value" /> 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="value" />只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" in the three characters that precede the final "m" of two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)" />方法時，用來尋找選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 後面接著"m"的位置上，在前面兩個字串的最後"m"的三個字元。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含必要的子字串。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，所以在這兩種情況下，方法執行區分文化特性的比較時都會傳回 "m" 在字串中的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".
trans-unit.target: 請注意，就第一個字串的情況，這個字串是選擇性連字號後面接著 "m"，結果方法不是傳回選擇性連字號的索引，而是傳回 "m" 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字串。

trans-unit.source: The character to locate within <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在「來源」<c></c>內尋找的字元。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向後搜尋之以零為起始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the section to search.
trans-unit.target: 區段中要搜尋的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: A value that defines how <c>source</c> and <c>value</c> should be compared.
trans-unit.target: 定義「來源」<c></c>和「值」<c></c>應該如何比較的值。

trans-unit.source: <c>options</c> is either the enumeration value <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" />, or a bitwise combination of one or more of the following values: <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreCase" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreSymbols" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreNonSpace" />, <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth" />, and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreKanaType" />.
trans-unit.target: 「選項」<c></c>若不是列舉值 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" />，就是下列一或多個值的位元組合：<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreCase" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreSymbols" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreNonSpace" />、<see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreKanaType" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified character and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the section of the source string that contains the specified number of elements and ends at the specified index using the specified <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值，搜尋指定的字元，並傳回最後一個相符項目 (在來源字串中含有指定項目數且結束於指定索引的區段內) 的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" />, if found, within the section of <paramref name="source" /> that contains the number of elements specified by <paramref name="count" /> and that ends at <paramref name="startIndex" />, using the specified comparison options; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則是在 <paramref name="value" /> 的區段 (包含 <paramref name="source" /> 所指定數目的項目，並結束於 <paramref name="count" />) 內，使用指定的比較選項，找到最後一次出現的 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 以零起始的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Returns <paramref name="startIndex" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 一個可忽略的字元，則傳回 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` - `count` + 1.
trans-unit.target: 來源字串是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`結束為`startIndex` - `count` + 1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not valid for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.StringSort?displayProperty=nameWithType>值無效，此方法。

trans-unit.source: If `options` does not include the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`不包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元是代表預先的字元的 Unicode 值，例如連字的"Æ"(U + 00 C 6)，它可能會視為以正確的順序，例如"AE 」 及其元件的任何項目 (U + 0041，U + 0045)，根據文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If `options` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal> value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search.
trans-unit.target: 如果`options`包含<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal>值，這個多載會執行序數 （不區分文化特性） 搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same.
trans-unit.target: 只要 Unicode 值相同，字元會視為等於另一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Overloads of <xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 多載<xref:System.String.LastIndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>字元的搜尋會執行序數搜尋，而其會搜尋字串執行區分文化特性的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> to specify the kind of comparison expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，您應該呼叫字串比較方法具有型別參數的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>指定比較預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> for security comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，用於比較使用者介面中顯示的字串 （使用目前文化特性） 的語言選項並指定<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>安全性比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="source" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an invalid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search, if <paramref name="value" /> is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 區分文化特性的搜尋時，如果<paramref name="value" />是可忽略的字元，結果就相當於搜尋已移除該字元。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method is used to find a soft hyphen (U+00AD) that precedes the final "m" in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法用來尋找兩個字串中選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 之前的最後"m"。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含選擇性連字號。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns the index position of the "m", which is the value of <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 在這兩種情況下，因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，區分文化特性的搜尋會傳回"m"，也就是值的索引位置的<paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.
trans-unit.target: 序數搜尋，不過，順利在一個字串中尋找選擇性連字號，並報告它不存在從第二個字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷字元或字串的一部分內子字串的第一個和最後一個項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is outside the range of valid indexes for <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 超出 <paramref name="source" /> 的有效索引範圍。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid section in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未指定 <paramref name="source" /> 中的有效區段。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an invalid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareOptions" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.
trans-unit.target: 字元集包含可忽略的字元，這些字元在執行語言或區分文化特性的排序時不列入考慮。

trans-unit.source: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if <paramref name="options" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase" />), if <paramref name="value" /> contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.
trans-unit.target: 執行區分文化特性的搜尋 (也就是說，如果 <paramref name="options" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.Ordinal" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase" />) 時，如果 <paramref name="value" /> 包含可忽略的字元，則結果等於在已移除該字元的情況下搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method always returns <paramref name="startIndex" />, which is the character position at which the search begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果<paramref name="value" />只包含一個或多個可忽略的字元，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法一律會傳回<paramref name="startIndex" />，即開始搜尋的字元位置。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" /> method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" in all but the first character position before the final "m" in two strings.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LastIndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CompareOptions)" />方法用來尋找兩個字串中的選擇性連字號 (U + 00AD) 後面接著"m"在所有位置，但最終"m"之前的第一個字元位置。

trans-unit.source: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.
trans-unit.target: 只有其中一個字串包含必要的子字串。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 因為選擇性連字號是可忽略的字元，所以在這兩種情況下，方法執行區分文化特性的比較時都會傳回 "m" 在字串中的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: When it performs an ordinal comparison, however, it finds the substring only in the first string.
trans-unit.target: 當它執行序數比較時，不過，它會尋找子字串只能在第一個字串中。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m" when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，就第一個字串，其中包含選擇性連字號後面接著"m"，此方法無法傳回選擇性連字號的索引執行區分文化特性的比較時，而是傳回"m"的索引。

trans-unit.source: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.
trans-unit.target: 只有在執行序數比較時，方法才會傳回第一個字串中選擇性連字號的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the properly formed culture identifier for the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 為目前的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" /> 取得正確格式的文化特性識別項。

trans-unit.source: The properly formed culture identifier for the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" /> 的正確格式之文化特性識別項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LCID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LCID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the culture used for sorting operations by this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得由此 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" /> 物件進行排序作業所使用之文化特性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a culture.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties can have different values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性可以有不同的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, an <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LCID%2A> property value of hexadecimal 0x10407 identifies an alternate sort culture that sorts names as they might appear in a German telephone book.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LCID%2A>十六進位 0x10407 屬性值會識別可能會出現在德文電話簿排序名稱的替代排序文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Name%2A> property has a value of "de-de_phoneb", whereas the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the associated German (Germany) culture has a value of "de-DE".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Name%2A>屬性的值為"de-de_phoneb"，而<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name?displayProperty=nameWithType>相關聯的德文 （德國） 文化特性屬性的值為"DE-DE"。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares three strings using the fr-FR and ja-JP cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會比較使用 FR-FR 和 JA-JP 文化特性的三個字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A> property is used to display the name of each culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A>屬性用來顯示每個文化特性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The object that initiated the callback.
trans-unit.target: 初始化回呼 (Callback) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: Runs when the entire object graph has been deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 執行於整個物件 Graph 已經還原序列化時。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation that can be used only when the current <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo> object is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作可用時，才目前<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>物件轉換成<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback>介面。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback.OnDeserialization%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback.OnDeserialization%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" /> 物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" /> 物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: It returns a string that consists of the class name and the value of the instance <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Name%2A> property, separated by a hyphen.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回字串，包含的類別名稱和執行個體的值<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Name%2A>屬性，以連字號分隔。

trans-unit.source: Staring with the .NET Framework 4, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.ToString" /> method returns the class name followed by a space, a hyphen, a space, and the value of the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 4，<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.ToString" />方法會傳回類別名稱，後面接著一個空格、 連字號、 空格和值<see cref="P:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Name" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" /> object that represents the en-US culture, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.ToString" /> method returns "CompareInfo - en-US".
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於<see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" />表示 EN-US 文化特性物件<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.ToString" />方法會傳回"Compareinfo 一起-EN-US"。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, it returns the class name followed by a space, a hyphen, a space, and the value of the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LCID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET framework 中，它會傳回類別名稱，後面接著一個空格、 連字號、 空格和值<see cref="P:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.LCID" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" /> object that represents the en-US culture, the <see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.ToString" /> method returns "CompareInfo - 1033".
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於<see cref="T:System.Globalization.CompareInfo" />表示 EN-US 文化特性物件<see cref="M:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.ToString" />方法會傳回"compareinfo 一起-1033年 」。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the version of Unicode used for comparing and sorting strings.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於比較和排序字串的 Unicode 版本的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains information about the Unicode version used for comparing and sorting strings.
trans-unit.target: 包含用於比較和排序字串之 Unicode 版本相關資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: The weight of individual characters, and therefore the way in which particular strings are compared or ordered, depends on the version of the Unicode specification that a particular version of the .NET Framework implements.
trans-unit.target: 個別字元的加權，因此特定字串的比較或排序的方式取決於特定版本的.NET Framework 會實作 Unicode 規格的版本。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], this also depends on the host operating system, as the following table shows.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，這也取決於主機作業系統中，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Note that this list of supported Unicode versions applies to character comparison and sorting only; it does not apply to classification of Unicode characters by category.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這份支援的 Unicode 版本清單僅適用於字元比較和排序，並不適用於依類別來分類 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework version
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 版本

trans-unit.source: Operating system
trans-unit.target: 作業系統

trans-unit.source: Unicode version
trans-unit.target: Unicode 版本

trans-unit.source: All operating systems
trans-unit.target: 所有作業系統

trans-unit.source: Unicode 5.0
trans-unit.target: Unicode 5.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] and later versions
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 和更新版本

trans-unit.source: Unicode 5.0
trans-unit.target: Unicode 5.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] and later versions
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 和更新版本

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] and later Windows operating system versions
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] 和更新版本的 Windows 作業系統版本

trans-unit.source: Unicode 6.3
trans-unit.target: Unicode 6.3

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.SortVersion> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Version%2A> property doesn't identify the precise Unicode version used to compare strings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.SortVersion>所傳回物件<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Version%2A>屬性不會識別用來比較字串的精確 Unicode 版本。

trans-unit.source: It is useful only when comparing two <xref:System.Globalization.SortVersion> objects to determine whether they use the same Unicode version and culture to compare strings.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個時，才會有用<xref:System.Globalization.SortVersion>物件來判斷是否它們使用相同的 Unicode 版本和文化特性來比較字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information and an example, see the <xref:System.Globalization.SortVersion> reference page.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.SortVersion>參考頁面。
